item.title: Usar Drone CI/CD con Traefik en NixOS
item.description: In this post we are going to see how to configure our own CI/CD environment with Drone, integrated with Traefik as reverse proxy and NixOS as operating system using github repositories. First we need to create an OAuth application in github and our RPC secret can be seen in this post or also in the drone docs. To create our RPC secret we will do the following: $ openssl rand -hex 16 bea26a2221fd8090ea38720fc445eca6
